verses.verse: Now in the twenty <S%H6242><s%> and fourth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were assembled <S%H622><s%> with fasting, <S%H6685><s%> and with sackcloths, <S%H8242><s%> and earth <S%H127><s%> on them.

And the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> separated <S%H914><s%> themselves from all <S%H3605><s%> strangers, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> and confessed <S%H3034><s%> their sins, <S%H2403><s%> and the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And they stood <S%H6965><s%> up in their place, <S%H5977><s%> and read <S%H7121><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> one fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of the day; <S%H3117><s%> and another fourth <S%H7243><s%> part they confessed, <S%H3034><s%> and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

Then stood <S%H6965><s%> up on the stairs, <S%H4608><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> Jeshua, <S%H3442><s%> and Bani, <S%H1137><s%> Kadmiel, <S%H6934><s%> Shebaniah, <S%H7645><s%> Bunni, <S%H1137><s%> Sherebiah, <S%H8274><s%> Bani, <S%H1137><s%> and Chenani, <S%H3662><s%> and cried <S%H2199><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

Then the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> Jeshua, <S%H3442><s%> and Kadmiel, <S%H6934><s%> Bani, <S%H1137><s%> Hashabniah, <S%H2813><s%> Sherebiah, <S%H8274><s%> Hodijah, <S%H1940><s%> Shebaniah, <S%H7645><s%> and Pethahiah, <S%H6611><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Stand <S%H6965><s%> up and bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever: <S%H5769><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> be your glorious <S%H3519><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which is exalted <S%H7311><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> blessing <S%H1293><s%> and praise. <S%H8416><s%>

You, even you, are LORD <S%H3068><s%> alone; <S%H905><s%> you have made <S%H6213><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens, <S%H8064><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> their host, <S%H6635><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> things that are therein, <S%H5921><s%> the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is therein, and you preserve <S%H2421><s%> them all; <S%H3605><s%> and the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> worships <S%H7812><s%> you.

You are the LORD <S%H3068><s%> the God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> did choose <S%H977><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> and brought <S%H3318><s%> him forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees, <S%H3778><s%> and gave <S%H7760><s%> him the name <S%H8034><s%> of Abraham; <S%H85><s%>

And found <S%H4672><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> faithful <S%H539><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him to give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> and the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> and the Girgashites, <S%H1622><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it, I say, to his seed, <S%H2233><s%> and have performed <S%H6965><s%> your words; <S%H1697><s%> for you are righteous: <S%H6662><s%>
And did see <S%H7200><s%> the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and heard <S%H8085><s%> their cry <S%H2201><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea; <S%H3220><s%>

And showed <S%H5414><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> on Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and on all <S%H3605><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and on all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of his land: <S%H776><s%> for you knew <S%H3045><s%> that they dealt proudly <S%H2102><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them. So did you get <S%H6213><s%> you a name, <S%H8034><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And you did divide <S%H1234><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, so that they went <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H8432><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> on the dry <S%H3004><s%> land; and their persecutors <S%H7291><s%> you threw <S%H7993><s%> into the deeps, <S%H4688><s%> as a stone <S%H68><s%> into the mighty <S%H5794><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>

Moreover you led <S%H5148><s%> them in the day <S%H3119><s%> by a cloudy <S%H6051><s%> pillar; <S%H5982><s%> and in the night <S%H3915><s%> by a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> to give them light <S%H216><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> they should go. <S%H3212><s%>

You came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> also on mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> with them from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them right <S%H3477><s%> judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and true <S%H571><s%> laws, <S%H8451><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> statutes <S%H2706><s%> and commandments: <S%H4687><s%>

And made <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> to them your holy <S%H6944><s%> sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> and commanded <S%H6680><s%> them precepts, <S%H4687><s%> statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and laws, <S%H8451><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> your servant: <S%H5650><s%>

And gave <S%H5414><s%> them bread <S%H3899><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> for their hunger, <S%H7457><s%> and brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> for them out of the rock <S%H5553><s%> for their thirst, <S%H6772><s%> and promised <S%H559><s%> them that they should go <S%H935><s%> in to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you had sworn <S%H5375><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them.
But they and our fathers <S%H1><s%> dealt proudly, <S%H2102><s%> and hardened <S%H7185><s%> their necks, <S%H6203><s%> and listened <S%H8085><s%> not to your commandments, <S%H4687><s%>

And refused <S%H3985><s%> to obey, <S%H8085><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> were mindful <S%H2142><s%> of your wonders <S%H6381><s%> that you did <S%H6213><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> them; but hardened <S%H7185><s%> their necks, <S%H6203><s%> and in their rebellion <S%H4805><s%> appointed <S%H5414><s%> a captain <S%H7218><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> to their bondage: <S%H5659><s%> but you are a God <S%H433><s%> ready to pardon, <S%H5547><s%> gracious <S%H2587><s%> and merciful, <S%H7349><s%> slow <S%H750><s%> to anger, <S%H639><s%> and of great <S%H7227><s%> kindness, <S%H2617><s%> and forsook <S%H5800><s%> them not.

Yes, <S%H637><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> they had made <S%H6213><s%> them a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf, <S%H5695><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is your God <S%H430><s%> that brought <S%H5927><s%> you up out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and had worked <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> provocations; <S%H5007><s%>

Yet you in your manifold <S%H7227><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%> forsook <S%H5800><s%> them not in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> departed <S%H5493><s%> not from them by day, <S%H3119><s%> to lead <S%H5148><s%> them in the way; <S%H1870><s%> neither the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> to show them light, <S%H216><s%> and the way <S%H1870><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> they should go. <S%H3212><s%>

You gave <S%H5414><s%> also your good <S%H2896><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> to instruct <S%H7919><s%> them, and withheld <S%H4513><s%> not your manna <S%H4478><s%> from their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them water <S%H4325><s%> for their thirst. <S%H6772><s%>

Yes, forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> did you sustain <S%H3557><s%> them in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> so that they lacked <S%H2637><s%> nothing; <S%H3808><s%> their clothes <S%H8008><s%> waxed not old, <S%H1086><s%> and their feet <S%H7272><s%> swelled <S%H1216><s%> not.

Moreover you gave <S%H5414><s%> them kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> and nations, <S%H5971><s%> and did divide <S%H2505><s%> them into corners: <S%H6285><s%> so they possessed <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Sihon, <S%H5511><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

Their children <S%H1121><s%> also multiplied <S%H7235><s%> you as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> concerning which <S%H834><s%> you had promised <S%H559><s%> to their fathers, <S%H1><s%> that they should go <S%H935><s%> in to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

So the children <S%H1121><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in and possessed <S%H3423><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and you subdued <S%H3665><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them into their hands, <S%H3027><s%> with their kings, <S%H4428><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> that they might do <S%H6213><s%> with them as they would.

And they took <S%H3920><s%> strong <S%H1219><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and a fat <S%H8082><s%> land, <S%H127><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> goods, <S%H2898><s%> wells <S%H953><s%> dig, <S%H2672><s%> vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and olive groves, <S%H2132><s%> and fruit <S%H3978><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> in abundance: <S%H7230><s%> so they did eat, <S%H398><s%> and were filled, <S%H7646><s%> and became <S%H8080><s%> fat, <S%H8082><s%> and delighted <S%H5727><s%> themselves in your great <S%H1419><s%> goodness. <S%H2898><s%>

Nevertheless they were disobedient, <S%H4784><s%> and rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against you, and cast <S%H7993><s%> your law <S%H8451><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> their backs, <S%H1458><s%> and slew <S%H2026><s%> your prophets <S%H5030><s%> which <S%H834><s%> testified <S%H5749><s%> against them to turn <S%H7725><s%> them to you, and they worked <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> provocations. <S%H5007><s%>

Therefore you delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies, <S%H6862><s%> who vexed <S%H6887><s%> them: and in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their trouble, <S%H6869><s%> when they cried <S%H6817><s%> to you, you heard <S%H8085><s%> them from heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and according to your manifold <S%H7227><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%> you gave <S%H5414><s%> them saviors, <S%H3467><s%> who saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies. <S%H6862><s%>

But after they had rest, <S%H5117><s%> they did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: therefore left <S%H5800><s%> you them in the land <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies, <S%H341><s%> so that they had the dominion <S%H7287><s%> over them: yet when they returned, <S%H7725><s%> and cried <S%H2199><s%> to you, you heard <S%H8085><s%> them from heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> times <S%H6256><s%> did you deliver <S%H5337><s%> them according to your mercies; <S%H7356><s%>

And testified <S%H5749><s%> against them, that you might bring <S%H7725><s%> them again <S%H7725><s%> to your law: <S%H8451><s%> yet they dealt proudly, <S%H2102><s%> and listened <S%H8085><s%> not to your commandments, <S%H4687><s%> but sinned <S%H2398><s%> against your judgments, <S%H4941><s%> (which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> he shall live <S%H2421><s%> in them;) and withdrew <S%H5414><s%> <S%H5437><s%> the shoulder, <S%H3802><s%> and hardened <S%H7185><s%> their neck, <S%H6203><s%> and would not hear. <S%H8085><s%>

Yet many <S%H7227><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> did you forbear <S%H4900><s%> them, and testified <S%H5749><s%> against them by your spirit <S%H7307><s%> in your prophets: <S%H5030><s%> yet would they not give ear: <S%H238><s%> therefore gave <S%H5414><s%> you them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the lands. <S%H776><s%>

Nevertheless for your great <S%H7227><s%> mercies' <S%H7356><s%> sake you did not utterly consume <S%H3615><s%> them, nor <S%H3808><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> them; for you are a gracious <S%H2587><s%> and merciful <S%H7349><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, our God, <S%H430><s%> the great, <S%H1419><s%> the mighty, <S%H1368><s%> and the terrible <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> who keep <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy, <S%H2617><s%> let not all <S%H3605><s%> the trouble <S%H8513><s%> seem <S%H4591><s%> little <S%H4591><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, that has come <S%H4672><s%> on us, on our kings, <S%H4428><s%> on our princes, <S%H8269><s%> and on our priests, <S%H3548><s%> and on our prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and on our fathers, <S%H1><s%> and on all <S%H3605><s%> your people, <S%H5971><s%> since the time <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
However, you are just <S%H6662><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that is brought <S%H935><s%> on us; for you have done <S%H6213><s%> right, <S%H571><s%> but we have done wickedly: <S%H7561><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> have our kings, <S%H4428><s%> our princes, <S%H8269><s%> our priests, <S%H3548><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> our fathers, <S%H1><s%> kept <S%H6213><s%> your law, <S%H8451><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> listened <S%H7181><s%> to your commandments <S%H4687><s%> and your testimonies, <S%H5715><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> you did testify <S%H5749><s%> against them.

For they have not served <S%H5647><s%> you in their kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and in your great <S%H7227><s%> goodness <S%H2898><s%> that you gave <S%H5414><s%> them, and in the large <S%H7342><s%> and fat <S%H8082><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you gave <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, neither <S%H3808><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> they from their wicked <S%H7451><s%> works. <S%H4611><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we are servants <S%H5650><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> and for the land <S%H776><s%> that you gave <S%H5414><s%> to our fathers <S%H1><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof and the good <S%H2898><s%> thereof, behold, <S%H2009><s%> we are servants <S%H5650><s%> in it:

And it yields <S%H7235><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> increase <S%H8393><s%> to the kings <S%H4428><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you have set <S%H5414><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us because of our sins: <S%H2403><s%> also they have dominion <S%H4910><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> our bodies, <S%H1472><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> our cattle, <S%H929><s%> at their pleasure, <S%H7522><s%> and we are in great <S%H1419><s%> distress. <S%H6869><s%>

And because of all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> we make <S%H3772><s%> a sure <S%H548><s%> covenant, and write <S%H3789><s%> it; and our princes, <S%H8269><s%> Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and priests, <S%H3548><s%> seal <S%H2856><s%> to it.
